sentences.cn: 一个身材高大、不修边幅的女人

sentences.en: Don't slouch in that slovenly way!
He had no dealings with those slovenly easy riders.
sentences.cn: 他不与那些不修边幅,到处闲荡的人打交道.

sentences.en: He was half elegant, half slovenly.
sentences.cn: 他是一半讲究, 一半马虎.

sentences.en: He's a scrawny, greyfaced man, who looks half - starved, and he's always very slovenly in appearance.
sentences.cn: 他是个瘦骨棱棱,脸色发灰的人, 活象没吃饱饭, 外表总是非常邋遢.

sentences.en: He's always so down at heel; is he hard up or just slovenly?
sentences.cn: 他总是这么邋遢, 是生活潦倒还是不修边幅?

sentences.en: His appearance is even more slovenly than usual.
sentences.cn: 他的样子比平常更为邋遢.

sentences.en: If puffy hair as Einstein's, is on our heads, we certainly are as a slovenly guy.
sentences.cn: 爱因斯坦一头蓬松的乱发,如果在我们头上, 准被世人批评为不修边幅.

sentences.en: In these squalid surroundings she becomes slovenly herself.
sentences.cn: 在这肮脏的环境中,她本人也变得十分邋遢懒散了.

sentences.en: Lisa was irritated by the slovenly attitude of her boyfriend Sean.
sentences.cn: 莉萨对男朋友肖恩吊儿郎当的态度非常恼火。

sentences.en: People were scandalized at the slovenly management of the company.
sentences.cn: 人们对该公司草率的经营感到愤慨.

sentences.en: The dinner was served in a slovenly manner.
sentences.cn: 这顿饭潦草地开了出来.

sentences.en: The officers were rather slovenly in their methods.
sentences.cn: 这些官员行事十分散漫。

sentences.en: Those terrible overalls would make anyone look slovenly.
sentences.cn: 无论谁穿上那种不像样子的长罩衣也是个邋遢相.
